59  /**
60   * Test open and close of regions using zk.
61   */
62  @Category(MediumTests.class)
63  public class TestZKBasedOpenCloseRegion {
64    private static final Log LOG = LogFactory.getLog(TestZKBasedOpenCloseRegion.class);
65    private static final HBaseTestingUtility TEST_UTIL = new HBaseTestingUtility();
66    private static final String TABLENAME = "TestZKBasedOpenCloseRegion";
67    private static final byte [][] FAMILIES = new byte [][] {Bytes.toBytes("a"),
68      Bytes.toBytes("b"), Bytes.toBytes("c")};
69    private static int countOfRegions;
70  
71    @BeforeClass public static void beforeAllTests() throws Exception {
72      Configuration c = TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration();
73      c.setClass(HConstants.REGION_SERVER_IMPL, TestZKBasedOpenCloseRegionRegionServer.class,
74                HRegionServer.class);
75      c.setBoolean("dfs.support.append", true);
76      c.setInt("hbase.regionserver.info.port", 0);
77      TEST_UTIL.startMiniCluster(2);
78      TEST_UTIL.createTable(Bytes.toBytes(TABLENAME), FAMILIES);
79      HTable t = new HTable(TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration(), TABLENAME);
80      countOfRegions = TEST_UTIL.createMultiRegions(t, getTestFamily());
81      waitUntilAllRegionsAssigned();
82      addToEachStartKey(countOfRegions);
83      t.close();
84    }
85  
86    @AfterClass public static void afterAllTests() throws Exception {
87      TEST_UTIL.shutdownMiniCluster();
88    }
89  
90    @Before public void setup() throws IOException {
91      if (TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster().getLiveRegionServerThreads().size() < 2) {
92        // Need at least two servers.
93        LOG.info("Started new server=" +
94          TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster().startRegionServer());
95  
96      }
97      waitUntilAllRegionsAssigned();
98      waitOnRIT();
99    }
100 
101   /**
102    * Special HRegionServer used in these tests that allows access to
103    * {@link #addRegionsInTransition(HRegionInfo, String)}.
104    */
105   public static class TestZKBasedOpenCloseRegionRegionServer extends HRegionServer {
106     public TestZKBasedOpenCloseRegionRegionServer(Configuration conf)
107         throws IOException, InterruptedException {
108       super(conf);
109     }
110     @Override
111     public void addRegionsInTransition(HRegionInfo region,
112         String currentAction) throws RegionAlreadyInTransitionException {
113       super.addRegionsInTransition(region, currentAction);
114     }
115   }
116 
117   /**
118    * Test we reopen a region once closed.
119    * @throws Exception
120    */
121   @Test (timeout=300000) public void testReOpenRegion()
122   throws Exception {
123     MiniHBaseCluster cluster = TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster();
124     LOG.info("Number of region servers = " +
125       cluster.getLiveRegionServerThreads().size());
126 
127     int rsIdx = 0;
128     HRegionServer regionServer =
129       TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster().getRegionServer(rsIdx);
130     HRegionInfo hri = getNonMetaRegion(regionServer.getOnlineRegions());
131     LOG.debug("Asking RS to close region " + hri.getRegionNameAsString());
132 
133     AtomicBoolean closeEventProcessed = new AtomicBoolean(false);
134     AtomicBoolean reopenEventProcessed = new AtomicBoolean(false);
135 
136     EventHandlerListener closeListener =
137       new ReopenEventListener(hri.getRegionNameAsString(),
138           closeEventProcessed, EventType.RS_ZK_REGION_CLOSED);
139     cluster.getMaster().executorService.
140       registerListener(EventType.RS_ZK_REGION_CLOSED, closeListener);
141 
142     EventHandlerListener openListener =
143       new ReopenEventListener(hri.getRegionNameAsString(),
144           reopenEventProcessed, EventType.RS_ZK_REGION_OPENED);
145     cluster.getMaster().executorService.
146       registerListener(EventType.RS_ZK_REGION_OPENED, openListener);
147 
148     LOG.info("Unassign " + hri.getRegionNameAsString());
149     cluster.getMaster().assignmentManager.unassign(hri);
150 
151     while (!closeEventProcessed.get()) {
152       Threads.sleep(100);
153     }
154 
155     while (!reopenEventProcessed.get()) {
156       Threads.sleep(100);
157     }
158 
159     LOG.info("Done with testReOpenRegion");
160   }
161 
162   private void waitOnRIT() {
163     // Close worked but we are going to open the region elsewhere.  Before going on, make sure
164     // this completes.
165     while (TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster().getMaster().getAssignmentManager().
166         isRegionsInTransition()) {
167       LOG.info("Waiting on regions in transition: " +
168         TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster().getMaster().getAssignmentManager().
169           getRegionsInTransition());
170       Threads.sleep(10);
171     }
172   }
173 
174   private HRegionInfo getNonMetaRegion(final Collection<HRegionInfo> regions) {
175     HRegionInfo hri = null;
176     for (HRegionInfo i: regions) {
177       LOG.info(i.getRegionNameAsString());
178       if (!i.isMetaRegion()) {
179         hri = i;
180         break;
181       }
182     }
183     return hri;
184   }
185 
186   public static class ReopenEventListener implements EventHandlerListener {
187     private static final Log LOG = LogFactory.getLog(ReopenEventListener.class);
188     String regionName;
189     AtomicBoolean eventProcessed;
190     EventType eventType;
191 
192     public ReopenEventListener(String regionName,
193         AtomicBoolean eventProcessed, EventType eventType) {
194       this.regionName = regionName;
195       this.eventProcessed = eventProcessed;
196       this.eventType = eventType;
197     }
198 
199     @Override
200     public void beforeProcess(EventHandler event) {
201       if(event.getEventType() == eventType) {
202         LOG.info("Received " + eventType + " and beginning to process it");
203       }
204     }
205 
206     @Override
207     public void afterProcess(EventHandler event) {
208       LOG.info("afterProcess(" + event + ")");
209       if(event.getEventType() == eventType) {
210         LOG.info("Finished processing " + eventType);
211         String regionName = "";
212         if(eventType == EventType.RS_ZK_REGION_OPENED) {
213           TotesHRegionInfo hriCarrier = (TotesHRegionInfo)event;
214           regionName = hriCarrier.getHRegionInfo().getRegionNameAsString();
215         } else if(eventType == EventType.RS_ZK_REGION_CLOSED) {
216           TotesHRegionInfo hriCarrier = (TotesHRegionInfo)event;
217           regionName = hriCarrier.getHRegionInfo().getRegionNameAsString();
218         }
219         if(this.regionName.equals(regionName)) {
220           eventProcessed.set(true);
221         }
222         synchronized(eventProcessed) {
223           eventProcessed.notifyAll();
224         }
225       }
226     }
227   }
228 
229   public static class CloseRegionEventListener implements EventHandlerListener {
230     private static final Log LOG = LogFactory.getLog(CloseRegionEventListener.class);
231     String regionToClose;
232     AtomicBoolean closeEventProcessed;
233 
234     public CloseRegionEventListener(String regionToClose,
235         AtomicBoolean closeEventProcessed) {
236       this.regionToClose = regionToClose;
237       this.closeEventProcessed = closeEventProcessed;
238     }
239 
240     @Override
241     public void afterProcess(EventHandler event) {
242       LOG.info("afterProcess(" + event + ")");
243       if(event.getEventType() == EventType.RS_ZK_REGION_CLOSED) {
244         LOG.info("Finished processing CLOSE REGION");
245         TotesHRegionInfo hriCarrier = (TotesHRegionInfo)event;
246         if (regionToClose.equals(hriCarrier.getHRegionInfo().getRegionNameAsString())) {
247           LOG.info("Setting closeEventProcessed flag");
248           closeEventProcessed.set(true);
249         } else {
250           LOG.info("Region to close didn't match");
251         }
252       }
253     }
254 
255     @Override
256     public void beforeProcess(EventHandler event) {
257       if(event.getEventType() == EventType.M_RS_CLOSE_REGION) {
258         LOG.info("Received CLOSE RPC and beginning to process it");
259       }
260     }
261   }
262 
263   /**
264    * This test shows how a region won't be able to be assigned to a RS
265    * if it's already "processing" it.
266    * @throws Exception
267    */
268   @Test
269   public void testRSAlreadyProcessingRegion() throws Exception {
270     LOG.info("starting testRSAlreadyProcessingRegion");
271     MiniHBaseCluster cluster = TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster();
272 
273     HRegionServer hr0 =
274         cluster.getLiveRegionServerThreads().get(0).getRegionServer();
275     HRegionServer hr1 =
276         cluster.getLiveRegionServerThreads().get(1).getRegionServer();
277     HRegionInfo hri = getNonMetaRegion(hr0.getOnlineRegions());
278 
279     // Fake that hr1 is processing the region. At top of this test we made a
280     // regionserver that gave access addRegionsInTransition. Need to cast as
281     // TestZKBasedOpenCloseRegionRegionServer.
282     ((TestZKBasedOpenCloseRegionRegionServer) hr1).addRegionsInTransition(hri, "OPEN");
283 
284     AtomicBoolean reopenEventProcessed = new AtomicBoolean(false);
285     EventHandlerListener openListener =
286       new ReopenEventListener(hri.getRegionNameAsString(),
287           reopenEventProcessed, EventType.RS_ZK_REGION_OPENED);
288     cluster.getMaster().executorService.
289       registerListener(EventType.RS_ZK_REGION_OPENED, openListener);
290 
291     // now ask the master to move the region to hr1, will fail
292     TEST_UTIL.getHBaseAdmin().move(hri.getEncodedNameAsBytes(),
293         Bytes.toBytes(hr1.getServerName().toString()));
294 
295     // make sure the region came back
296     assertEquals(hr1.getOnlineRegion(hri.getEncodedNameAsBytes()), null);
297 
298     // remove the block and reset the boolean
299     hr1.removeFromRegionsInTransition(hri);
300     reopenEventProcessed.set(false);
301     
302     // now try moving a region when there is no region in transition.
303     hri = getNonMetaRegion(hr1.getOnlineRegions());
304 
305     openListener =
306       new ReopenEventListener(hri.getRegionNameAsString(),
307           reopenEventProcessed, EventType.RS_ZK_REGION_OPENED);
308 
309     cluster.getMaster().executorService.
310       registerListener(EventType.RS_ZK_REGION_OPENED, openListener);
311     
312     TEST_UTIL.getHBaseAdmin().move(hri.getEncodedNameAsBytes(),
313         Bytes.toBytes(hr0.getServerName().toString()));
314 
315     while (!reopenEventProcessed.get()) {
316       Threads.sleep(100);
317     }
318 
319     // make sure the region has moved from the original RS
320     assertTrue(hr1.getOnlineRegion(hri.getEncodedNameAsBytes()) == null);
321 
322   }
323 
324   @Test (timeout=300000) public void testCloseRegion()
325   throws Exception {
326     LOG.info("Running testCloseRegion");
327     MiniHBaseCluster cluster = TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster();
328     LOG.info("Number of region servers = " + cluster.getLiveRegionServerThreads().size());
329 
330     int rsIdx = 0;
331     HRegionServer regionServer = TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster().getRegionServer(rsIdx);
332     HRegionInfo hri = getNonMetaRegion(regionServer.getOnlineRegions());
333     LOG.debug("Asking RS to close region " + hri.getRegionNameAsString());
334 
335     AtomicBoolean closeEventProcessed = new AtomicBoolean(false);
336     EventHandlerListener listener =
337       new CloseRegionEventListener(hri.getRegionNameAsString(),
338           closeEventProcessed);
339     cluster.getMaster().executorService.registerListener(EventType.RS_ZK_REGION_CLOSED, listener);
340 
341     cluster.getMaster().assignmentManager.unassign(hri);
342 
343     while (!closeEventProcessed.get()) {
344       Threads.sleep(100);
345     }
346     LOG.info("Done with testCloseRegion");
347   }
348 
349   /**
350    * If region open fails with IOException in openRegion() while doing tableDescriptors.get()
351    * the region should not add into regionsInTransitionInRS map
352    * @throws Exception
353    */
354   @Test
355   public void testRegionOpenFailsDueToIOException() throws Exception {
356     HRegionInfo REGIONINFO = new HRegionInfo(Bytes.toBytes("t"),
357         HConstants.EMPTY_START_ROW, HConstants.EMPTY_START_ROW);
358     HRegionServer regionServer = TEST_UTIL.getHBaseCluster().getRegionServer(0);
359     TableDescriptors htd = Mockito.mock(TableDescriptors.class);
360     Object orizinalState = Whitebox.getInternalState(regionServer,"tableDescriptors");
361     Whitebox.setInternalState(regionServer, "tableDescriptors", htd);
362     Mockito.doThrow(new IOException()).when(htd).get((byte[]) Mockito.any());
363     try {
364       regionServer.openRegion(REGIONINFO);
365       fail("It should throw IOException ");
366     } catch (IOException e) {
367     }
368     Whitebox.setInternalState(regionServer, "tableDescriptors", orizinalState);
369     assertFalse("Region should not be in RIT",
370         regionServer.containsKeyInRegionsInTransition(REGIONINFO));
371   }
372   
373   private static void waitUntilAllRegionsAssigned()
374   throws IOException {
375     HTable meta = new HTable(TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration(),
376       HConstants.META_TABLE_NAME);
377     while (true) {
378       int rows = 0;
379       Scan scan = new Scan();
380       scan.addColumn(HConstants.CATALOG_FAMILY, HConstants.SERVER_QUALIFIER);
381       ResultScanner s = meta.getScanner(scan);
382       for (Result r = null; (r = s.next()) != null;) {
383         byte [] b =
384           r.getValue(HConstants.CATALOG_FAMILY, HConstants.SERVER_QUALIFIER);
385         if (b == null || b.length <= 0) {
386           break;
387         }
388         rows++;
389       }
390       s.close();
391       // If I get to here and all rows have a Server, then all have been assigned.
392       if (rows >= countOfRegions) {
393         break;
394       }
395       LOG.info("Found=" + rows);
396       Threads.sleep(1000);
397     }
398     meta.close();
399   }
400 
401   /*
402    * Add to each of the regions in .META. a value.  Key is the startrow of the
403    * region (except its 'aaa' for first region).  Actual value is the row name.
404    * @param expected
405    * @return
406    * @throws IOException
407    */
408   private static int addToEachStartKey(final int expected) throws IOException {
409     HTable t = new HTable(TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration(), TABLENAME);
410     HTable meta = new HTable(TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration(),
411         HConstants.META_TABLE_NAME);
412     int rows = 0;
413     Scan scan = new Scan();
414     scan.addColumn(HConstants.CATALOG_FAMILY, HConstants.REGIONINFO_QUALIFIER);
415     ResultScanner s = meta.getScanner(scan);
416     for (Result r = null; (r = s.next()) != null;) {
417       byte [] b =
418         r.getValue(HConstants.CATALOG_FAMILY, HConstants.REGIONINFO_QUALIFIER);
419       if (b == null || b.length <= 0) {
420         break;
421       }
422       HRegionInfo hri = Writables.getHRegionInfo(b);
423       // If start key, add 'aaa'.
424       byte [] row = getStartKey(hri);
425       Put p = new Put(row);
426       p.setWriteToWAL(false);
427       p.add(getTestFamily(), getTestQualifier(), row);
428       t.put(p);
429       rows++;
430     }
431     s.close();
432     Assert.assertEquals(expected, rows);
433     t.close();
434     meta.close();
435     return rows;
436   }
437 
438   private static byte [] getStartKey(final HRegionInfo hri) {
439     return Bytes.equals(HConstants.EMPTY_START_ROW, hri.getStartKey())?
440         Bytes.toBytes("aaa"): hri.getStartKey();
441   }
442 
443   private static byte [] getTestFamily() {
444     return FAMILIES[0];
445   }
446 
447   private static byte [] getTestQualifier() {
448     return getTestFamily();
449   }
450 
451   public static void main(String args[]) throws Exception {
452     TestZKBasedOpenCloseRegion.beforeAllTests();
453 
454     TestZKBasedOpenCloseRegion test = new TestZKBasedOpenCloseRegion();
455     test.setup();
456     test.testCloseRegion();
457 
458     TestZKBasedOpenCloseRegion.afterAllTests();
459   }

463     new org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ResourceCheckerJUnitRule();
